T02TD2484E:180b-1: badzra y'a na patti manydza ri n'a ma /
T02TD2484E:180b-3: rdo rje theg pa'i ltung ba'i snye ma zhes bya ba /
T02TD2484E:180b-4: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2484E:180b-5: rdo rje sems dpa'i sngom pa 'dzin ba la ltung ba'i sde tshan rnam pa gnyis te /
T02TD2484E:180b-6: rtsa ba'i ltung ba bshad pa dang /
T02TD2484E:180b-7: sbom po'i ltung ba bshad pa'o //
T02TD2484E:180b-8: de la bla ma la gus pa dang /
T02TD2484E:180b-9: bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' las 'das pa dang /
T02TD2484E:180b-10: zhe sdang gis rdo rje sbun la skyon 'bru ba dang /
T02TD2484E:180b-12: byang chub kyi sems gtong ba dang /
T02TD2484E:181a-2: yongs su ma smin pa la gsang ba sgrogs pa dang /
T02TD2484E:181a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid phung po lnga la smod pa dang /
T02TD2484E:181a-4: chos thams cad rang bzhin med par rnam par dag pa la the tshom zab dang /
T02TD2484E:181a-5: gdug pa la byams pa dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD2484E:181a-8: dbus kyi chos thams cad stong pa la thog ma dang tham dang dbus su rtog pa dang /
T02TD2484E:181a-9: dad ldan gyi sems sun 'byin pa dang /
T02TD2484E:181a-10: ji ltar rnyed pa'i dam tshig mi bsten pa dang /
T02TD2484E:181a-11: bud med la smod pa ste rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi'o //
T02TD2484E:181a-12: de la stobs kyis rnal 'byor ma len pa dang stobs kyis de'i byang chub kyi sems len pa dang /
T02TD2484E:181a-13: gsang ba mi spod pa dang /
T02TD2484E:181a-14: dam tshig la rtsod pa dang /
T02TD2484E:181a-15: dad pa dang ldan pa la phyin ci log gi chos ston pa dang /
T02TD2484E:181a-16: nyan thos kyi theg pa dang lhan cig zhag bdun du gnas pa dang /
T02TD2484E:181a-17: rnal 'byor mi shes par rnal 'byor par mngon pa'i nga rgyal byed pa dang /
T02TD2484E:181a-18: mi dad pa la chos ston pa ste sbom po'i ltung ba brgyad do //
T02TD2484E:181a-19: rdo rje sems dpa'i bslab pa la gnas pas rnam pa thams cad du yongs su spang bar bya'o //
T02TD2484E:181a-20: rdo rje theg pa'i ltung ba'i snye ma zhes bya ba mkhas pa chen po aa bhy'a ka ra guptas mdzad pa rdzogs so ;
T02TD2484E:181a-21: / ma ga dh'a'i mkhas pa chen po de nyid dang /
T02TD2484E:181a-22: mang du thos pa'i dge slong bsod snyoms pa sangs rgyas grags pas n'a lendrar bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
